source_objects.title: Mobile Development
source_objects.description: Learn how to build your mobile app for iOS, Android and Kindle.

items.title: Mobile App Dev with Ionic and React: Idea to App Store
items.headline: Everything you need to go from nothing to a fully-functional mobile app UI with Ionic Framework and React.
objectives_summary: Everything you need to go from nothing to a working mobile application UI with Ionic Framework and React.

items.title: Android Studio Masterclass - APP DEVELOPMENT COURSE

visible_instructors.title: Sagar Kundu
visible_instructors.name: Sagar
visible_instructors.job_title: I am a Film maker , a YOUTUBER & a SELF LEARNER

items.headline: Learn Android App Development using ANDROID STUDIO & JAVA JDK .
objectives_summary: The EXPERTISE to be an Android Nougat app developer as taught by the best
The course is continually UPDATED, so you’ll learn the very latest as Android Nougat evolves.
The skills you’ll learn are in HIGH DEMAND. You’ve learned to program like an expert. Go get that job!

items.title: Hybrid Mobile App Development with Ionic
items.headline: Leveraging AngularJS, CSS, HTML5, and Apache Cordova in the Ionic Framework
objectives_summary: Once you have completed this training course, you will have learned how to build hybrid mobile applications with the Ionic framework
Learn how to build apps with the Ionic framework

items.title: PhoneGap Development for Absolute Beginners
items.headline: Learn the PhoneGap development framework and understand the Basic concepts of PhoneGap Applications.
objectives_summary: You will acquire a knowledge of  HTML5 and CSS3
You will be able to create your First PhoneGap Application

items.title: iOS 10 Swift 3 hands on features - Siri Kit , Messages , ...

visible_instructors.title: Yohann Taieb
visible_instructors.name: Yohann
visible_instructors.job_title: Apps Games Unity iOS Android Apple Watch TV Development

items.headline: Build real useful app using the latest iOS 10 and Swift 3 features - Hands on projects, all source codes included.
objectives_summary: iOS 10 Speech Recognition: Learn how to use Siri's power within your app to get to transcribe audio into text! Also learn how to record the iPhone user's voice and get to turn it into text!
- Stickers is the upcoming gold rush. Learn how to create sticker app extensions for the Messages app. No coding skills required!
- Learn Swift 3 changes. Get an in-depth look at the differences between swift 2 and Swift 3 for common usage, such as Strings, Arrays, Core Graphics, Iteration loops, and much more.

items.title: Mobile GIS and Mapping Applications with Leaflet
items.headline: Take your applications outside, with or without connectivity
objectives_summary: Students will learn to format web mapping applications to deal with small screens, touch screens, and screens of varying sizes. They will also learn how to take advantage of the GPS sensor on mobile devices, store data on board, create an application cache so the application can be loaded off-line, and create custom base maps that can be used off-line.

items.title: Wordpress to App - Turn Your Website Into an Android App

visible_instructors.title: Maya Bielik
visible_instructors.name: Maya
visible_instructors.job_title: In love with online teaching, thrilled to spread knowledge!

items.headline: Flash course! Learn how to turn your Wordpress (or non-Wordpress) website into a downloadable ANDROID app by tomorrow.
objectives_summary: Turn your website into a native app
Send push notifications to your app users
Turn your Wordpress website into a fully responsive one

items.title: Flutter - Firebase - CRUD - Build 2 Apps super easy!
items.headline: Understand how Firebase works and how to wire it up with Flutter
objectives_summary: - Connect Firebase to Flutter project
- Know how to create, read, update, delete Items in your Firebase Database
- Use Streambuilder to display all your Data

items.title: WebRTC 2021 Practical Course. Build Video Chat With React
items.headline: Learn WebRTC by creating React application with direct and group calls.
objectives_summary: Create own WebRTC implementation for video calls
Add WebRTC data channels to exchange data
Create video chat app in React

items.title: Learn iOS8 and Swift App Programming
items.headline: Be an Expert in latest iPhone iOS8 Programming with Swift & Xcode, SpriteKit, SQLite, HealthKit, SceneKit & OpenGL – ES
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of Swift, the new programming language from Apple
Become and expert in App development with iOS8
Learn by example by walking you through real live projects step by step

items.title: Learn programming in Swift Step by Step

visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students

items.headline: Learn to code in Apple's new programming language. Learn how to use  tools that generate millions in revenue.
objectives_summary: Learn to code in Swift
Learn how to use Xcode

items.title: Getting Started with PHP and MySQL Development
items.headline: We’ll Introduce fundamental of PHP and the Basic Concepts of RDBMS in general with MySQL Database for Beginners
objectives_summary: Over 40 lectures and 4 hours of content!
You will acquire knowledge of basic PHP Functions, Arrays and many more..
You will be able to create your basic PHP website.

items.title: Swift 4.0 Programming & Certification

visible_instructors.title: Vivian Aranha
visible_instructors.name: Vivian
visible_instructors.job_title: Mobile Solutions Architect and Professional Trainer

items.headline: Basics to Advanced Programming in Swift 4.0 to set your stage to build iOS Mobile Applications
objectives_summary: Learn Swift and be ready to take on the world of mobile applications for iOS and also Mac development
Learn any other programming language easily

items.title: iOS 14 & Swift 5: Financial App with Stock APIs & Unit Tests
items.headline: Build a dollar cost averaging calculator to project potential returns for financial assets like stocks, equities & ETFs
objectives_summary: Parse financial data via Stock APIs on Alpha Vantage
Rest API calls with API key
Investment concepts like Dollar Cost Averaging

items.title: Android Cars App using Kotlin, PHP and Google Maps

visible_instructors.title: Dhoyazan Adbo Othman
visible_instructors.name: Dhoyazan Adbo
visible_instructors.job_title: Senior Trainer and Developer at Pioneers Academy

items.headline: Kotlin, Volley, PHP, SMS and Google Map API with features like Uber taxi app
objectives_summary: Understand Kotlin Programming Language from Scratch
Implement OOP concepts in Kotlin
Create PHP web service connected to MySQL database

items.title: Learn how to build a Chess game in iOS 10.

visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students

items.headline: Learn how to make a Chess game in Xcode and code it with Swift. Learn about how to set up a simple AI!
objectives_summary: Be able to make a chess game
Learn about Swift and Xcode
Learn about how to add in a simple AI
